alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Clark; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 9:09PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CLARK...EASTERN BOURBON AND SOUTHERN NICHOLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 909 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carlisle, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carlisle, North Middletown, Jackstown, Blacks Crossroads, Plum, Bunker Hill, East Union, Little Rock and Sewell Shop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
